Index.heroDesc: My name is <important >Joseph Vilca</important>, I am a full stack developer from <important2>Perú</important2>. I design and develop solutions for all types of industries.
Index.project1: Y2mate type video downloader, made with next js for the frontend and express for the backend. It uses the executable of the yt-dlp module. You choose a quality and the app will download a video with the quality specified or the best one that it can get not greater than the specified one.
Index.project2: Website for the company Lubricantes Especiales Del Perú, it has company presentation, static catalog of products and it's also optimized for mobiles. Made with nextjs in static way.
Index.project3: Simple video downloader app for desktop. It was made with python along with pyside6 with QML for the UI. It uses yt-dlp module. You choose a quality and the app will download a video with the quality specified or the best one that it can get not greater than the specified one.
Index.projectDominaria: This project is a website dedicated to House Framing, built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS for a fast, modern, and fully responsive experience. It runs inside a Docker container, ensuring easy deployment and scalability.

about.title: About me
about.desc1: My name is James Joseph Vilca Vargas, I am a full stack developer. My passion for technology started in high school. I am currently 29 years old.
about.desc2: I would like to be part of a development team in a company to test all my knowledge..
about.desc3: My goal is to properly give solutions to my clients in a professional way

concepts.title: Concepts
concepts.c12: Basic knowledge of the  main AWS services

e1.title: Freelancer
e1.desc1: I have provided IT support and implemented different types of python scripts and web applications for businesses such as kiosks, small stores and on fiverr.
e1.desc2: I attend emergencies and provide hardware maintenance periodically as well.

e2.title: Independent Hardware Reseller
e2.desc1: I was in charge of promoting, quoting and selling hardware to end users.
e2.desc2: I learned a lot about PC assembly, hardware troubleshooting, operating system installation, backups and data recovery.

Index.contact: If you need someone to make your project come true, contact me and hire me .
